seeds.scene: Some boys are playing, one is pushing the other in a toy car as the latter yells "ah!".

seeds.action: to his wife, on his front stoop
seeds.line: I'm going now...
What time will you be home tonight?
I don't know, probably late.
Don't forget the cannoli!

seeds.action: getting into the car, as is Rocco
seeds.line: Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah...
Rocco, sit on the other side. You block the rearview mirror
That Sonny's runnin' wild. He's thinkin'a going to the mattresses find a spot over on the – 309 West 43rd Street. spots on the West Side
Yeah, I think about it
Well think about it while you're drivin', will ya? I wanna hit New York sometime this month. And watch out for the kids while you're backin' out.
Hey, Paulie, I want you to go down 39th Street. Carlo Santos you pick up 18 -
Yeah...
...mattresses for the guys to sleep, while you bring me the bill...
Uh-huh, yeah, alright... That...?... bill
Ya'know, you make sure they're clean, cuz those guys'll be stuck up in there for a long time, ya'know?
They're clean. They told me they exterminate them .
Exterminate? That's a bad word to use: exterminate! Get this guy. Watch out we don't exterminate you laughs.
You think that's funny, or what?
Hey, Paulie –
Did you fart?
Hey, Rocco, what did you do?
Not me...nothin'...it wasn't me
It's gotta be him, then...
Pull over, will yah? I gotta take a leak.

seeds.scene: Paulie pulls over, and Clemenza gets out to relieve himself. Rocco shoots Paulie three times as we hear a variation of the "Title Theme" music.

seeds.line: Leave the gun. Take the cannoli.

seeds.scene: MICHAEL is standing next to an easel. On the easel are a bunch of numbers and simple equations. Beside it is a crude display of calling cards.
OSCAR, JIM, RYAN, TOBY, CREED, STANLEY AND DWIGHT are sitting in chairs watching him. Dwight is feverishly taking notes. CREED is studying a pamphlet.

seeds.line: So Phil recruited me to sell these cards, and now I am recruiting you.
Who is this guy again?
Don't worry about Phil. He drives a Corvette. He's fine
What color is yet? Yellow?
Just -- calling cards are the future. They sell themselves
Who uses calling cards anymore?
Great attitute Ryan. Just trying to get you to invest in your future.
We do invest. We have our 401k.
Well, with this, I promise you'll make much more than 401k, Stanley
This sounds like a get-rich-quick scheme
Yes! Thank you. You will get rich quick. We all will
Didn't you lose a lot of money from that other investment -- the one from the e-mail?
What don't you understand Toby? His dad RAN THE FREAKIN' COUNTRY. And when the son of the deposed King of Nigeria e-mails you directly asking for help, you help. Okay?
Absolutely
Now raise your hand if you wanna get in
How is this not a pyramid scheme?
Ugh. I'll show you again.

seeds.scene: Michael rips off the old paper and proceeds to draw on the pad. His body blocks the board. Finally, he reveals it.

seeds.line: Get it? Not a pyramid scheme

seeds.scene: We see that Michael's drawn a series of stick figures in the shape of a pyramid. Jim walks up, takes the sharpie, and draws a perfect triangle around the stick figures.

seeds.action: Michael stares at Jim's pyramid. He slowly tilts his head to the side, viewing it from a differnt angle.

seeds.line: I gotta go make a phone call.

seeds.action: Michael runs out of the room.

seeds.line: You know what I think? We can do this without him.
